column4: I'm having trouble with WINE. I'm trying to install Star Wars: Empire at War, which has two CDs. The first CD started up and ran perfectly, but when it came time for the second CD, I put it in, but WINE couldn't find it. Any help?
different game - I copied the deus ex image into a wine c:/ and it detected and runs perfect - well wine perfect
What do you mean? Copying the image from the second CD into the .wine folder?
personally I'd do both and then direct the path to those discs
